name: SciVi-FSGraph
description: Simple graph visualization module of SciVi

scripts.debug: rm -f -r ./tmp && rm -f -r ./dist && tsc -p . && webpack --mode development && cp dist/SciViFSGraph.*.js ../demo/fsgraph/lib
scripts.debug_win: del /q /s tmp && del /q /s dist && tsc -p . && webpack --mode development && copy /y dist\SciViFSGraph.*.js ..\demo\fsgraph\lib
scripts.release_win: del /q /s tmp && del /q /s dist && tsc -p . && webpack --mode production && copy /y dist\SciViFSGraph.*.js ..\demo\fsgraph\lib
